actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Act to provide that not less than 30 percent of funds appropriated for grants for construction of treatment works shall be made available for obligation in nonmetropolitan areas.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide that not less than 30 percent of funds appropriated for grants for construction of treatment works shall be made available for obligation in nonmetropolitan areas. Defines "nonmetropolitan area" for the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Act to provide that not less than 30 percent of funds appropriated for grants for construction of treatment works shall be made available for obligation in nonmetropolitan areas.
